response.original_title: Bear In The Big Blue House - Shapes Sounds & Colors With Bear
response.overview: Get in shape with Bear (TM) and his buddies in three colorful tales, featuring four sing-a-long songs, while teaching pattern recognition, listening, and creative self-expression! Prepare to be dazzled when Bear's friends turn his red wagon into a true work of art in "A Wagon of a Different Color." Have fun with Ojo (TM), Pip (TM) & Pop (TM) as they watch their world take shape in "Shape of a Bear," and "Listen Up" with Bear for the sounds of the great outdoors in three delightful stories sure to set your creativity free!
response.title: Bear In The Big Blue House - Shapes Sounds & Colors With Bear
